name: Free the Animation
description:
Free the Animation

WebGL Animation and Game

Animation with the Roller Coaster
Shooting Game with the Roller Coaster

Many Background Images:
- Cubemaps
- Spherical Panoramas
- Planar Panoramas

Many Dynamic Effects:
- Fog Density
- Exposure of the Cubemaps and of the Panoramas
- Color Mixing with Variable Opacity

Notes:
- Compatibility with 4K / HDR
- SBS (Side-by-Side)
- Full Screen
- Gamepad Support
- 3D Positional Audio
